Yesterday a guy from Reddit to exchange language added my instagram account, he asked me many questions about what kind of music I like, and let me to recommend some Chinese music to him. Maybe it's because I said I love listening music in my daily life

However I have to say that his avatar ( a green skull ) really scared me ğŸ¥¹ , so I just recommended my favourite R&B singer â€” David Tao to him. Then, I said, " I'm so sorry but your avatar scared me so I have to say goodbye to you" and blocked his account.

I don't know whether I did right, maybe it's a nice guy maybe it's strange.....
